paracetamol.warning: pregnant women and heart patients must stay vary of this medicine
paracetamol.side: rash, itching/swelling (especially of the face/tongue/throat), severe dizziness, trouble breathing

amoxicillin.warning: You should not use amoxicillin if you are allergic to any penicillin antibiotic such as ampicillin, dicloxacillin, oxacillin, penicillin, or ticarcillin.To make sure this medicine is safe for you, tell your doctor if you have kidney disease
amoxicillin.side:
Abdominal or stomach cramps or tenderness 
back, leg, chest or stomach pains
black, tarry stools
bleeding nose,gums or urine
nausea
bloating
cough
difficulty with breathing
difficulty with swallowing
fast heartbeat
feeling of discomfort
fever
general body swelling
headache
heavier menstrual periods
pale skin
pinpoint red spots on the skin
puffiness or swelling of the eyelids or around the eyes, face, lips, or tongue
rash
red, irritated eyes
redness, soreness, or itching skin
sores, welting, or blisters
sudden decrease in the amount of urine
unusual bleeding or bruising, tiredness, weakness or weight loss
vomiting of blood and yellow eyes or skin
amoxicillin.for: over 3 months and weighing over 40 kg

cyclopam.treats:
irritable bowel syndrome, period pain, pain in stomach, fever, headache
cold, toothache, joint pain and abdominal pain
cyclopam.warning: Renal ailment patients, heart patients must stay vary of this medicine
cyclopam.side: Nausea, lightheadedness, fatigue, weakness and nervousness

adderall.warning: Not for you if you have high blood pressure, heart disease, an overactive thyroid, glaucoma,or are allergic to medication
adderall.side:
Loss of appetite, nervousness,trouble sleeping,
weight loss, dry mouth, stomach upset/pain,
vomiting, dizziness, headache, diarrhea and fever
